body.name: 10 Pack Stove Burner Covers Double Thickness Reusable Non-Stick Heat-Resistant Gas Range Protectors for Kitchen and Easy to Clean（Black）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 40 mins
features: 【High Quality】: It have Non-stick coating keeps gas plates clean and gas stove protectors can stand high temperatures up to 500℉.

【Reusable and Clean Easily】:The stover burner cover is used of glass fiber cloth that coated with high-quality Teflon, which have a strong non-sticking function, easily cover the mess and oil that already on the stove surface and clean by soapy water or dishwasher.

【NON-TOXIC & SAFETY】:Our Gas range protectors with non-toxic 100% Certified BPA & PFOA free will not release chemical smell, keep harmful chemicals away from you and your loved ones which make your life more convenient.
【Easy to Cut】:Before use, you can use scissors to trim the holes in the stove cover to make it fit your gas stove correctly.Our stove burner cover have the pre-cut inner circle to be easily cut.

【Safety and Environmental Protection】: Our stove burner cover does not release chemical odors when use, it not only keep harmful chemicals away from you and your family but make your life more convenient.
body.description: Features Material - PTFE coating fiberglass fabric Thickness - 0.3mm Color – Black Size – 27x27cm Package Includes – 10 Pieces Weight – 230gm Benefits No more scrubbing to clean the stove surface Prevent Oil overflow to the gas stove burner while cooking Protect your stove-top from messes, stains and grease Keep your stove like new one Reduce your time on kitchen cleaning, so you can spend quality time with your loved ones. Reusable so last for quite a long time Easy to remove when you need to clean them How to use? 1-Take off the stove grate 2-Measure the size precisely and mark by pen 3-Cut the hole of covers at least 0.5 inch away from the flame on the highest setting 4-Place the cover on stove top 5-Put back the grate and finish Warm tips Do not use directly on flame or heat element because these are not fire retardant so could be burn in touched by the flame at the center of stove. Do not use Fahrenheit above 500 degrees Remove protector before cleaning stove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 0.3MM Thickness more Reliable Our stove burner cover is 0.3mm thickness, which is different from 0.2mm or 0.1mm thickness. It is much more reliable and durable than 0.2 mm. High-temperature Resistant Each burner cover gas has been proven to be highly flexible and heat resistant to withstand temperatures up to 260°C (500°F). Warm reminder：Please make sure that the gas stove burner cover is kept at least 0.5 inches from the flame to avoid any damages of the product or other injuries. Easy to Clean You can wash this stove burner cover in hot soapy water or in a dishwasher, lasts longer and doesn't wrinkle, fold or warp. They are completely reusable and resistant to food, grease, and water.

Cut for Perfect Fit 1. Measuring the size precisely and mark by a pen. 2. Cutting to a suitable size according to the mark. 3. Taking off the stove accessories and laying the cover. 4. Reassembling accessories and finish. Non-stick Material The stover burner cover is used for glass fiber cloth that coated with high-quality Teflon, which has a strong non-sticking function. Widely Used The Stove burner covers are widely used in many types of stoves, you just need to cut according to the size of your stove then you can use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Solution with Some Limitations
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 10 Pack Stove Burner Covers and found them to be a budget-friendly solution for maintaining a clean stove. Here's a concise review:Affordability (⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐):One of the standout features of these burner covers is their affordability. They offer a cost-effective way to keep your stove clean and protected.Customizable Fit (⭐⭐⭐⭐):I appreciate that these covers are trimmable to fit various burner sizes, allowing for customization to suit your stove's layout.Performance (⭐⭐⭐):However, it's important to note that while these covers serve their purpose, they may not be as durable or long-lasting as more premium alternatives. You do get what you pay for in terms of quality.In summary, the 10 Pack Stove Burner Covers provide a wallet-friendly solution for stove maintenance. They are customizable and serve their purpose, but durability may be a concern over time. If you're looking for a budget-friendly option that gets the job done, these covers are worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: The only accurate point about these covers are they are easy to clean.First they are a solid square. There are no perforations or guidelines around the edges or center to help you customize the fit. Unless you have access to a piece of white chalk and a protractor, good luck getting a proper fit around the center. Being fiberglass they do not cut as easily as one might think, make sure you have sharp, sturdy scissors.Heat resistant, maybe, but definitely not fire resistant, merely flame retardant. Due to the inability to size correctly, they slide around under the trivet and if not careful will catch on fire and burn. I will not spend my money on these again, I think investing in disposable aluminum covers will be more cost effective, safer, and just as easy to clean.Fail!

reviews.reviewText: More work cutting and fitting than it seems..I returned the product when I realized that so I can’t actually review the longevity etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: They are not sturdy. Just for show. You’re better off paying money for real stove covers. A waste of money.

reviews.reviewTitle: I wish I had known about these burner covers long ago.
reviews.reviewText: My husband does most of the cooking, which is great, however he is messy and doesn't like the clean up. Need I say more? These covers save me so much scrubbing time, and I don't get upset anymore when the stove looks like it's been through a nuclear holocaust. The covers are so easy to clean. I like the idea of having extra covers; I simply remove the dirty ones, throw them into the sink, grab clean burner covers from the drawer and put in place. My husband is off and cooking again...No fuss, no muss.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product and does the job
reviews.reviewText: Got these mats to protect our gas counter top stove. Works as advertised, easy to cut the edges to fit around the burners. The material is easy to wash. The procure comes with extras to replace when they get old. One thing to note is that it wouldn’t fit the large rectangular burner.
I purchased these stove protectors and they work fabulous. Will definitely be buying more.

I wish I could give them zero stars, complete waste of money and time cutting them.. these won’t stay on the base of stove and for that you need to cut them more and more to a point if there is a spill you would have to put more energy into it!! To the manufacturer: this should be a bit heavy and not like a paper.. as it is more prone to fire when not completely on the base! Stop manufacturing this and wasting your resources as mine went to the garbage already!

reviews.reviewerName: This T-fall is great for the kitchen
